name: Luminance HDR
description:
An open source graphical user interface application that aims to provide a workflow for HDR imaging, such as:
  • Create an HDR file from a set of images (formats: JPEG, TIFF 8bit and 16bit, RAW) of the same scene taken at different exposure setting
  • Save load HDR images
  • Rotate, resize and crop HDR images
  • Tonemap HDR images
  • Copy exif data between sets of images
Supported HDR formats are OpenEXR (extension: exr), Radiance RGBE (extension: hdr), Tiff formats: 16bit, 32bit (float) and LogLuv (extension: tiff), Raw image formats (extension: various) and PFS native format (extension: pfs) plus then following LDR formats JPEG; PNG; PPM; PBM; TIFF (8/16 bits).
